metadata.description: Mock data matching real webscrape structure for testing analysis logic

calls.title: Trustworthy AI for cybersecurity of critical infrastructure

general_info.action_type: HORIZON-RIA HORIZON Research and Innovation Actions

content.description: Expected Outcome: Development of trustworthy AI systems for cybersecurity of critical infrastructure. Projects should address AI-based threat detection, anomaly detection, and automated response systems. Required expertise in machine learning, cybersecurity frameworks, and NIS2 compliance. SMEs are particularly encouraged to participate.
content.conditions: Eligible countries: EU Member States and Associated Countries. Legal entities established in China are not eligible. Minimum 3 partners from 3 different countries required.
content.budget_overview: Topic Budget: 30 000 000 EUR. Contributions: 3 000 000 to 5 000 000 EUR per project. Funding rate: 70% for SMEs, 100% for non-profit.

calls.title: Next-Generation AI Agents for Real-World Applications in the Apply AI sectors

general_info.action_type: HORIZON-RIA HORIZON Research and Innovation Actions

content.description: Expected Outcome: Next-generation AI agents powered by large AI models capable of autonomous planning, tool utilization, and multi-step task execution. Focus on improving autonomy, robustness, and reliability through advanced planning mechanisms and memory management.
content.destination: Achieving open strategic autonomy in digital and emerging enabling technologies (2026-27)
content.conditions: Participation limited to legal entities established in Member States, Iceland, Norway and associated countries. Legal entities established in China are not eligible.
content.budget_overview: Topic Budget: 38 000 000 EUR. Contributions: around 19 000 000 EUR per project.

calls.title: Accelerating Physical AI: Embodied Intelligence for the Next Frontier of AI-Powered Robotics

content.description: Expected Impact: Support the ambitions of the AI Act and Apply AI Strategy. Two-stage Challenge competition to deliver scalable prototypes of Physical AI technology validated in real-world environments. Solutions expected to demonstrate novelty and applicability while mitigating risks.
content.conditions: Open for submission by single legal entity (mono-beneficiary): start-up, SME or research performing organisation. Larger companies not eligible as single entity.
content.budget_overview: Topic Budget: 6 000 000 EUR. Contributions: around 300 000 EUR per grant. Indicative number of grants: 10.

calls.title: AI-Driven Robotics for Industry: Enabling System Integration and Adoption

content.description: Expected Outcome: Deliver common frameworks and reusable building blocks for AI-powered robotics serving multiple sectors. Bridge gap between technology providers and end-users. Improve competitiveness of European industries, notably SMEs via advanced robotics systems and cutting-edge AI innovations.
content.destination: Achieving open strategic autonomy in digital and emerging enabling technologies (2026-27)
content.conditions: Participation limited to legal entities established in Member States, Iceland, Norway and associated countries including Canada, Israel, Republic of Korea, New Zealand, Switzerland, United Kingdom.
content.budget_overview: Topic Budget: 18 000 000 EUR. Contributions: around 18 000 000 EUR. Indicative number of grants: 1.

calls.title: Efficient and compliant access to and use of data

content.description: Expected Outcome: Development of secure, compliant and adaptive systems improving data availability, accuracy, privacy and interoperability. Deliver advanced AI-driven compliance technologies reducing administrative burdens. Support Data Union Strategy and Common European Data Spaces.
content.conditions: Legal entities established in China are not eligible. Minimum consortium requirements apply.
content.budget_overview: Topic Budget: 46 500 000 EUR. Contributions: 11 500 000 to 23 500 000 EUR. Indicative number of grants: 3.

calls.title: Дигитална трансформация на малки и средни предприятия

content.description: Национална програма за подкрепа на дигиталната трансформация на МСП. Финансиране за внедряване на ERP системи, облачни услуги, киберсигурност и автоматизация на бизнес процеси.
content.conditions: Само за малки и средни предприятия регистрирани в България. Минимум 1 година дейност.
content.budget_overview: Общ бюджет: 50 000 000 BGN. Размер на безвъзмездната помощ: 20 000 - 200 000 BGN на проект. Интензитет на финансиране: 50-60%.

calls.title: Challenge-Driven GenAI4EU Booster in Apply AI prioritised sectors

general_info.action_type: HORIZON-RIA HORIZON Research and Innovation Actions

content.description: Expected Outcome: Significant technology progress in Generative AI for aerospace, pharma/drug development, or telecommunication networks. Increased competitivity of Generative AI community. Challenge-driven approach to boost adoption of GenAI.
content.conditions: Legal entities established in China are not eligible.
content.budget_overview: Topic Budget: 17 000 000 EUR. Contributions: around 17 000 000 EUR per project.

calls.title: Agricultural AI for Sustainable Farming and Food Security

general_info.action_type: HORIZON-RIA HORIZON Research and Innovation Actions

content.description: Expected Outcome: Development of AI solutions for precision agriculture, crop monitoring, and sustainable farming. Focus on agricultural production only. Projects should address soil health, water management, and yield optimization exclusively for agriculture sector.
content.destination: Food, Bioeconomy, Natural Resources, Agriculture and Environment
content.conditions: Legal entities established in China are not eligible. Minimum 4 partners required.
content.budget_overview: Topic Budget: 20 000 000 EUR. Contributions: 4 000 000 to 6 000 000 EUR.

general_info.action_type: HORIZON-RIA HORIZON Research and Innovation Actions

content.description: Expected Outcome: Development of advanced NLP technologies supporting multilingual applications across Europe. Focus on machine translation, language understanding, and conversational AI for underrepresented languages. Perfect match for NLP expertise.
content.conditions: Legal entities established in China are not eligible. Open to all EU and associated countries.
content.budget_overview: Topic Budget: 15 000 000 EUR. Contributions: 3 000 000 to 5 000 000 EUR per project.

content.description: Процедура за подкрепа на предприятия за внедряване на дигитални технологии. Възможности за финансиране на софтуерни решения, обучения и консултации. Подходящо за AI компании с фокус върху дигитална трансформация.
content.conditions: Само за МСП от България. Минимален стаж на фирмата: 1 година.
content.budget_overview: Общ бюджет: 80 000 000 BGN. Размер на помощта: 50 000 - 300 000 BGN. Интензитет: 70%.

calls.title: Space Data Analytics for Maritime Operations

general_info.action_type: HORIZON-RIA HORIZON Research and Innovation Actions

content.description: Expected Outcome: Development of space-based data analytics for maritime operations only. Satellite monitoring for shipping routes, ocean protection, and maritime security. Focus exclusively on maritime sector applications.
content.conditions: Legal entities established in China are not eligible. Consortium of min 5 partners.
content.budget_overview: Topic Budget: 25 000 000 EUR. Contributions: 5 000 000 EUR per project.

calls.title: COST Open Call for Network Proposals - Cybersecurity

content.description: Expected Outcome: Networking programme for cybersecurity research. Supports research networks, workshops, and knowledge sharing. Perfect opportunity for Bulgarian cybersecurity experts to join European networks.
content.conditions: Open to COST member countries. Minimum 7 institutions from 5 different countries.
content.budget_overview: Topic Budget: 130 000 EUR per year. Network funding for 4 years.
